long_description: Solid Thule(R) construction at a solid price. This hitch rack carries two bikes securely and loads easily, so get out and have some fun! Dual bike-arm design offers great fit, fitting all types of bikes and minimizing the need for top-tube adapters. Soft rubber cradles protect your bike frame while holding your bike securely in place. Tilt-down design for easy access to rear of vehicle. Fits 2-inch receiver hitches. Secure your rack to the receiver with the Snug Tite(TM) lock accessory, sold separately. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: Solid Thule(R) construction at a solid price. This hitch rack carries two bikes securely and loads easily, so get out and have some fun!
